title: Plot Sgdocsvm vs Ocsvm
description: In this lab, we will demonstrate how to use Stochastic Gradient Descent (SGD) to approximate the solution of a One-Class SVM in the case of an RBF kernel.

meta.title: Comparing Stochastic Gradient Descent and One-Class SVM Techniques
meta.description: Explore the use of Stochastic Gradient Descent to approximate One-Class SVM solutions with an RBF kernel on a toy dataset.
meta.keywords: machine learning, stochastic gradient descent, rbf kernel, scikit-learn, one class svm, data analysis, scikit-learn playground
